use nyc_taxi_discovery;


SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS [trip_data];

---- selecting sub data
SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) 
WITH (
    trip_mount FLOAT,
    trip_type INT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(2)
    ) 
    AS [trip_data];

    ---- target specific parition

    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) 
 AS [trip_data];


--- targetting specific year


SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) 
 AS [trip_data]
 WHERE year = '2020' AND month = '01'
